welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Morfelden-Walldorf, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and delight in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction, this terminal will be the future home of Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
